summary: Four gay French expatriots share a business in Barcelona. When they and their parents are thrown together for a "coming out" party, another French Farce ensues.
cast: Amira Casar|Julie Gayet|Bruno Putzulu|Alexandra London|Carmen Chaplin|Johnny Hallyday|Marie-France Pisier|Brigitte Roüan|Assumpta Serna|Elli Medeiros|Vittoria Scognamiglio|Jean-Claude Dauphin|Joan Crosas|Montse Mostaza|Marta Gil|Adrià Collado|Albert López-Murtra|Jean-Michel Portal|Edith Fambuena|Paca Barrera|Amel Djemel|Aouatefe Lahmani
title: ¿Entiendes?
